verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of the two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>, when they offered<WH7126> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and died<WH4191>;

Thus<WH2063> shall Aaron<WH175> come<WH935> into the holy<WH6944> place: with a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> for a sin offering<WH2403>, and a ram<WH352> for a burnt offering<WH5930>.

And Aaron<WH175> shall offer<WH7126> his bullock<WH6499> of the sin offering<WH2403>, which is for himself<WH1157>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for himself, and for his house<WH1004>.
And he shall take<WH3947> the two<WH8147> goats<WH8163>, and present<WH5975> them before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>.

And Aaron<WH175> shall cast<WH5414> lots<WH1486> upon the two<WH8147> goats<WH8163>; one<WH259> lot<WH1486> for the LORD<WH3068>, and the other<WH259> lot<WH1486> for the scapegoat<WH5799>. scapegoat: Heb. Azazel
And Aaron<WH175> shall bring<WH7126> the goat<WH8163> upon which the LORD'S<WH3068> lot<WH1486> fell<WH5927>, and offer<WH6213> him for a sin offering<WH2403>. fell: Heb. went up

And Aaron<WH175> shall bring<WH7126> the bullock<WH6499> of the sin offering<WH2403>, which is for himself, and shall make an atonement<WH3722> for himself, and for his house<WH1004>, and shall kill<WH7819> the bullock<WH6499> of the sin offering<WH2403> which is for himself:

And he shall take<WH3947> a censer<WH4289> full<WH4393> of burning<WH784> coals<WH1513> of fire<WH784> from off the altar<WH4196> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and his hands<WH2651> full<WH4393> of sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> beaten small<WH1851>, and bring<WH935> it within<WH1004> the vail<WH6532>:

And he shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499>, and sprinkle<WH5137> it with his finger<WH676> upon the mercy seat<WH3727> eastward<WH6924>; and before<WH6440> the mercy seat<WH3727> shall he sprinkle<WH5137> of the blood<WH1818> with his finger<WH676> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>.

Then shall he kill<WH7819> the goat<WH8163> of the sin offering<WH2403>, that is for the people<WH5971>, and bring<WH935> his blood<WH1818> within<WH1004> the vail<WH6532>, and do<WH6213> with that blood<WH1818> as he did<WH6213> with the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499>, and sprinkle<WH5137> it upon the mercy seat<WH3727>, and before<WH6440> the mercy seat<WH3727>:

And he shall make an atonement<WH3722> for the holy<WH6944> place, because of the uncleanness<WH2932> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and because of their transgressions<WH6588> in all their sins<WH2403>: and so shall he do<WH6213> for the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, that remaineth<WH7931> among them in the midst<WH8432> of their uncleanness<WH2932>. remaineth: Heb. dwelleth

And there shall be no man<WH120> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> when he goeth<WH935> in to make an atonement<WH3722> in the holy<WH6944> place, until he come out<WH3318>, and have made an atonement<WH3722> for himself, and for his household<WH1004>, and for all the congregation<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478>.

And he shall go out<WH3318> unto the altar<WH4196> that is before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for it; and shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the bullock<WH6499>, and of the blood<WH1818> of the goat<WH8163>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>.

And he shall sprinkle<WH5137> of the blood<WH1818> upon it with his finger<WH676> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>, and cleanse<WH2891> it, and hallow<WH6942> it from the uncleanness<WH2932> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And when he hath made an end<WH3615> of reconciling<WH3722> the holy<WH6944> place, and the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, and the altar<WH4196>, he shall bring<WH7126> the live<WH2416> goat<WH8163>:

And Aaron<WH175> shall lay<WH5564> both<WH8147> his hands<WH3027> upon the head<WH7218> of the live<WH2416> goat<WH8163>, and confess<WH3034> over him all the iniquities<WH5771> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and all their transgressions<WH6588> in all their sins<WH2403>, putting<WH5414> them upon the head<WH7218> of the goat<WH8163>, and shall send him away<WH7971> by the hand<WH3027> of a fit<WH6261> man<WH376> into the wilderness<WH4057>: a fit: Heb. a man of opportunity

And the goat<WH8163> shall bear<WH5375> upon him all their iniquities<WH5771> unto a land<WH776> not inhabited<WH1509>: and he shall let go<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> in the wilderness<WH4057>. not: Heb. of separation

And Aaron<WH175> shall come<WH935> into the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, and shall put off<WH6584> the linen<WH906> garments<WH899>, which he put on<WH3847> when he went<WH935> into the holy<WH6944> place, and shall leave<WH3240> them there:

And he shall wash<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> with water<WH4325> in the holy<WH6918> place<WH4725>, and put on<WH3847> his garments<WH899>, and come forth<WH3318>, and offer<WH6213> his burnt offering<WH5930>, and the burnt offering<WH5930> of the people<WH5971>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for himself, and for the people<WH5971>.
And the fat<WH2459> of the sin offering<WH2403> shall he burn<WH6999> upon the altar<WH4196>.

And he that let go<WH7971> the goat<WH8163> for the scapegoat<WH5799> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899>, and bathe<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> in water<WH4325>, and afterward<WH310> come<WH935> into the camp<WH4264>.

And the bullock<WH6499> for the sin offering<WH2403>, and the goat<WH8163> for the sin offering<WH2403>, whose blood<WH1818> was brought in<WH935> to make atonement<WH3722> in the holy<WH6944> place, shall one carry forth<WH3318> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>; and they shall burn<WH8313> in the fire<WH784> their skins<WH5785>, and their flesh<WH1320>, and their dung<WH6569>.
And he that burneth<WH8313> them shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899>, and bathe<WH7364> his flesh<WH1320> in water<WH4325>, and afterward<WH310> he shall come<WH935> into the camp<WH4264>.

And this shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> unto you: that in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, on the tenth<WH6218> day of the month<WH2320>, ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>, and do<WH6213> no work<WH4399> at all, whether it be one of your own country<WH249>, or a stranger<WH1616> that sojourneth<WH1481> among<WH8432> you:
For on that day<WH3117> shall the priest make an atonement<WH3722> for you, to cleanse<WH2891> you, that ye may be clean<WH2891> from all your sins<WH2403> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>.
It shall be a sabbath<WH7676> of rest<WH7677> unto you, and ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>, by a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769>.

And the priest<WH3548>, whom he shall anoint<WH4886>, and whom he shall consecrate<WH4390> <WH3027> to minister in the priest's office<WH3547> in his father's<WH1> stead, shall make the atonement<WH3722>, and shall put on<WH3847> the linen<WH906> clothes<WH899>, even the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899>: consecrate: Heb. fill his hand

And this shall be an everlasting<WH5769> statute<WH2708> unto you, to make an atonement<WH3722> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for all their sins<WH2403> once<WH259> a year<WH8141>. And he did<WH6213> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
